findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `addToBlackList` function.

findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling the `addToBlackList` function.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is required to remove unnecessary code.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant. Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using a variable before the declaration. This is usually happening either if it has not been declared yet or the variable has been declared in a different scope.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: L08 - Tautology or Contradiction
findings.description: Detects expressions that are tautologies or contradictions. For instance, an uint variable will always be greater than or equal to zero.
